abstract: Barry and June Steenkamp, parents of Reeva Steenkamp, model shot by her boyfriend Oscar Pistorius, say they believe his actions were deliberate; South African prosecutors are trying to overturn ruling that vindicated Pistorius of murder, convicting him instead on lesser charge of culpable homicide.
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius shot his girlfriend deliberately, her parents, Barry and June Steenkamp, said in their first public comments against a South African court ruling.

headline.main: South Africa: Pistorius Meant to Shoot His Girlfriend, Her Parents Assert
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: Pistorius Meant to Shoot His Girlfriend, Her Parents Assert

snippet: Oscar Pistorius shot his girlfriend deliberately, her parents, Barry and June Steenkamp, said in their first public comments against a South African court ruling.
